liquibase.change.AddPrimaryKeyChange

liquibase.change.AddPrimaryKeyChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddPrimaryKeyChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Creates a primary key out of an existing column or set of columns.

Definition at line 29 of file AddPrimaryKeyChange.java.
